name: One Button Minigames
description:
Minigames based on Twitch streamers!!!

Press once, a few times, spam, or hold that button..! The game determines the mechanic, but you have to figure out the mechanic for each game...

Be quick, you have 5 or less seconds depending on how well you are doing.

Submitted for the One Button to Rule Them All jam, so there are some things that are not balanced, and some art that wasn't done...
